name: WebServer_ESP32_SC_ENC
keywords: WebServer, Ethernet, MQTT, MQTTS, HTTP, HTTPS, SSL, Arduino, ESP32, ESP32-S3, ESP32-S2, ESP32-C3, ENC28J60, HTTP-Client, WebSocket-Client, MQTT-Client, server, client, websocket, LittleFS, SPIFFS, ThingStream
description: Simple Ethernet WebServer, HTTP/HTTPS Client wrapper library for ESP32_S2, S3 and C3 boards using ENC28J60 with LwIP Ethernet library. The WebServer supports HTTP(S) GET and POST requests, provides argument parsing, handles one client at a time. It provides HTTP(S), MQTT(S) Client and supports WebServer serving from LittleFS/SPIFFS
